text: ==Born in Strasbourg== Johannes Tauler Sebastian Brant Jean-Baptiste Kléber Marie Tussaud Ludwig I of Bavaria Charles Adolphe Wurtz Gustave Doré Charles de Foucauld Hans Bethe Arsène Wenger Elif title: List of people from Strasbourg
